law.text: The fees for filing certificates and copies of votes required to be filed with the state secretary shall be determined annually by the commissioner of administration under the provision of section three B of chapter seven for the following: Of Organization.—The certificates required by section nine, including the issuing of the certificate of incorporation. Of Increase of Capital.—The certificate required by section thirty-nine. Other Certificates.—The copies of the votes or certificates required by section eleven, thirty-six, thirty-seven, or forty of this chapter or section sixteen of chapter one hundred and fifty-five, and any other certificate required by law.
